about_the_game:
A monster-catching, dungeon-crawling RPG.
Take on the role of Anza as he embarks on his journey to find the Archfiend Natas.

Features:


  • Explore a randomly generated world with challenging difficulty.
  • Capture and train unique monsters.
  • Strategic gameplay with a Turn-Based Battle System.
  • Progress by leveling up your character and monsters, gaining powerful abilities.

Gameplay


Quests provide a significant amount of EXP but are limited.


There are various dungeons with different loot and stronger monsters.
Each dungeon type features random quests that can be completed to earn extra EXP.


You can obtain better equipment from treasure chests, or you can use your gold to purchase it from the shops in towns.


The overworld is semi-open. When you become strong enough, you can explore more areas.
The Demo version gives access to a small area in the beginning of the game.
